document_data.name: Bane Minion
document_data.mainbody: A '''Bane minion''' was a creature created by the deity [[Bane]] to serve his lieutenant, [[Gothmenes]].
document_data.Description: Bane minions came in three types: [[Black Bane minion|black]], [[Blue Bane minion|blue]], and [[Red Bane minion|red]]. In general, Bane minions were terrifying winged bipeds with upright locks and large tongues.
document_data.Abilities: All types of these creatures could [[See invisibility|see invisible]] creatures, and they were immune to [[fear]] as well as the breath of [[dragon]]s. They were not affected by [[death magic]], [[confusion]], oe [[poison]]s.
document_data.Combat: The combat abilities of Bane minions differed largely for each of the three types. Each type of minion was able to attack swiftly and utilize a deadly breath attack.
document_data.History: In the mid 14{{th}} century [[DR]], Gothmenes, a powerful [[balor]] and the favored officer of Bane, planned to capture the goodly [[mage]], [[Elminster]]. The Lord of Darkness created these gnarly beings to aid Gothemenes, and to populate his forces.
